depression.topic: Feeling slightly better but unsure why
depression.description: I've been feeling a little better this week, but I’m not exactly sure why.

depression.topic: Waking up more easily but struggling with motivation
depression.description: I’ve been able to wake up more easily in the mornings, but I still struggle with motivation.
Even though I managed to concentrate better while reading, my evenings still feel really difficult.
I know I need to clean my apartment, but it just feels like such a big task that I don’t know where to start.
I went out with my grandson again, and it was nice, but I still question whether I’m actually making progress.
I tried to give myself credit for doing things, but I keep thinking that I should have been doing them anyway.
I’ve been reading the therapy notes every day, and I think I’m starting to accept that my depression is real, but it’s still hard to fully believe.
I catch myself having negative thoughts, like thinking I won’t get better, and even though I remind myself they might not be true, I don’t always believe it.
